Text: Audio is not out of sync.  Don't listen to the cow.  :-)
I wish there were higher quality copies of this one, but thanks a gazillion times, .BONE. .
Thanks for the up, BONE. I've been meaning to watch this doc. Heard nothing but good things.
It looks and sounds great, but the audio is out of sync for me, as well (Mac 10.6 in Quicktime).
I, too, had sync issues, and I attempted to play it on my desktop PC, my laptop, and my PS3; had the same issue on each device. Pretty sure this is a problem with the file.
yeah audio is out of sync - but if you convert it to an AVI its good again. Used Format Factory myself (tested on my pc & ps3 - streamed/copied)
I had same audio sync issue on mac with quicktime but opening in VLC (free - google it) sorted it out fine so try this alternative :)
FAST download! Nice work. The audio isn't synched, however, I took the advice of jonty43 and opened it in VLC and it was perfect. Thanks for the upload, I'm seeding now....
